Module com.example.rubankgui
Package com.example.rubankgui

Class Date

java.lang.Object
com.example.rubankgui.Date
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Date>
public class Date extends Object implements Comparable<Date>
Defines a date and determines its validity of a given date given the day, month, and year.
Author:
Deshna Doshi, Haejin Song

  • Constructor Details

    • Date

      public Date(int year, int month, int day)
      Constructor to initialize values of instance variables.
      Parameters:
      year - the year of the date.
      month - the month of the date.
      day - the day of the date.

  • Method Details

    • advancedIsValid

      public boolean advancedIsValid()
      Determines if the date is a valid calendar date, within six months, and in the future.
      Returns:
      true if the date is valid, within six months, and in the future, false otherwise.

    • validCalendarDate

      public boolean validCalendarDate()
      Determines if the date is a legitimate calendar date.
      Returns:
      true if the date is a real date, false otherwise.

    • validMonth

      public boolean validMonth()
      Determines if the month of the date is valid.
      Returns:
      true if the month is valid, false otherwise.

    • validDay

      public boolean validDay()
      Determines if the day of the date is valid.
      Returns:
      true if the day is valid, false otherwise.

    • validYear

      public boolean validYear()
      Determines if the year of the date is valid.
      Returns:
      true if the year is valid, false otherwise.

    • withinSixMonths

      public boolean withinSixMonths()
      Determines if the date is within six months of today's date.
      Returns:
      true if the date is within six months, false otherwise.

    • withinSixMonths_MonthYearCheck

      public boolean withinSixMonths_MonthYearCheck(int currDay, int currMonth, int currYear)
      Determines if the month and year of the date are within six months.
      Parameters:
      currDay - the day of today's date.
      currMonth - the month of today's date.
      currYear - the year of today's date.
      Returns:
      true if the month and year are within six months, false otherwise.

    • withinSixMonths_CompleteCheck

      public boolean withinSixMonths_CompleteCheck()
      Determines if the day of the date (given the month and year are within six months) is within six months.
      Returns:
      true if the day (and month and year) are within six months, false otherwise.

    • isFutureDate

      public boolean isFutureDate()
      Determines if a date is a future date.
      Returns:
      true if the date is in the future, false otherwise.

    • isLeapYear

      public boolean isLeapYear()
      Determines if the year is a leap year.
      Returns:
      true if year is a leap year, false otherwise.

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid()
      Determines if the day, month, and year are legitimate calendar days, months, and years.
      Returns:
      true if the date is a legitimate date, false otherwise.

    • basicValidYear

      public boolean basicValidYear()
      Determines if the year is within 1900 and 2100. Arbitrarily set guidelines for determining a valid year.
      Returns:
      true if the year is within 1900 and 2100, false otherwise.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Converts the date into a "X/X/XXXX" formatted String.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      the date as a String.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Date checkDate)
      Determines if two dates are equivalent.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Date>
      Parameters:
      checkDate - the date that is being compared against the date calling the method.
      Returns:
      -1 if checkDate is larger, 0 if the dates are equal, 1 if checkDate is smaller.

      public int getYear()
      Getter for the year instance variable.
      Returns:
      the year in the date.
